title: code.talks 2022 - Form Validations Do Not Have To Suck. Introducing Vest!

media:group.media:title: code.talks 2022 - Form Validations Do Not Have To Suck. Introducing Vest!
media:group.media:description:
by Evyatar Alush

The web is what it is today much because of the form element, but even to this day forms are hard to write, maintain and validate properly. Forms are the interaction heavy parts of our apps, so this is where our users are most likely to experience bugs - and they often do.

In this session we'll learn together how to use Vest, a form validations framework inspired by unit testing libraries that makes it easy to validate even the most complex forms.
